room/work unit/grave/scabbard/family or clan/one of the 28 constellations of Chinese astronomy

pinyin: Ji2 bu3 li4 Gong1 zuo4 shi4

sentences.chinese: 由赫斯維克工作室設計。

sentences.english: Do the voice actors ever visit the studio to see the animation process?
sentences.chinese: 演員聲優是否在工作室看到過動畫製作的進程？

sentences.english: that it's okay to not do great in studio, but you can still succeed.
sentences.chinese: 在工作室學習不太好不要緊，你依然能成功。

sentences.english: I like working in the heart of the studio to maximize the space.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡在工作室的中心工作，最大化利用空間。

sentences.english: A hillside studio-house in Ushimado , Japan, by Tezuka Architects.
sentences.chinese: 山坡工作室家中牛窗，日本，由手冢建築師。

sentences.english: What other animation studios does Aardman take notice of?
sentences.chinese: 阿德曼工作室都關注哪些其他的動畫工作室呢？

sentences.english: What other animation studios does Aardman take notice of?
sentences.chinese: 阿德曼工作室都關注哪些其他的動畫工作室呢？

sentences.english: Stovall has been working in this studio for more than thirty years.
sentences.chinese: Stovall在這個工作室裏工作了三十多年了。

sentences.english: because I have to walk a really long way from the subway to get to the Yoga studio.
sentences.chinese: 因爲我從地鐵到瑜伽工作室要走很長的一段路。

sentences.english: Photography studio provide you with a few small nostrum you must use.
sentences.chinese: 北京攝影工作室爲您提供一些小妙方你一定用的着。

sentences.english: The man surnamed Huo operated a private studio in Quanjiao county.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，男子姓霍，在全椒縣經營一傢俬人工作室。

sentences.english: this is our makeshift dining room/margaux’s office.
sentences.chinese: 這是我們臨時的飯廳兼margaux的工作室。

sentences.english: Leonado set up his own workshop in 1477.
sentences.chinese: 達芬奇在1477年建立了自己的工作室。
她是意中藝術工作室的項目策展人。

sentences.english: The name of the group eventually became 943 Studio.
sentences.chinese: 小組名稱也最終確定爲“943工作室”。

sentences.english: Sam dreamily left the lottery studio.
sentences.chinese: 山姆朦朧左彩票工作室。
